comment: this professor is reallyyy nice but the work on connect is really tedious and the quizzes and tests are genuinely hard. his projects were fun though!

I took this class online and had zoom with the teacher a few times. He's very nice and a friendly teacher but there was a lot of work and they are decently hard. Very time consuming, I ended up dropping this class because we had 9 assignments, a quiz, and a big project due in the same week.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: Great teacher! He's always willing to help and give feedback. The course work was a bit much if you aren't focused. Not too hard, just a bit annoying. If you put in more than a little effort you'll do fine!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: (COVID-19 SEMESTER) Great teacher! Took his class asynchronous, uploaded a weekly voicethread which allowed us to feel like we had a lecture and was great! He also responds to emails very fast and helps when you have problems with the assignments.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: I've never written a review for a professor but I'm so happy Professor Ray will be my first. He has been one of the most caring, intelligent, and passionate professors I have ever taken. He truly cares about your learning experience and strives to make sure every student understands Spanish. If I could take him for all four semesters I would!!
